name: Cut Your Loses!
description:
You are rich.... But they want your tresure! You need to cut your loses and knock em out with your bags of gold before they steal everything you got!

How far can you go?

Submitted for the 3 hour game jam... Can you believe I did this junk just just under 3 hourse :?

Although I like the idea, its future depends on you guys... Want to see it improve? 

Beter art, high score, more difficulty, etc.
